title: Can we get the option to rearrange rune pages?
body:
Hoping to get the same function as runes last year where we could drag runes around in different order.
It's frustrating to not have basic runes at the top of my list to easily find them and champion runes at the bottom.

replies.body:
Yes, we're working on this feature! Hopefully it should be out with the next patch - we have a few weird bugs we're still ironing out.

EDIT: I should be more clear - when I say next patch I'm talking 8.2. We've already missed the cutoff for 8.1 next week :o

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1Usgj89s,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-04T06:16:46.495+0000)
>
> Yes, we're working on this feature! Hopefully it should be out with the next patch - we have a few weird bugs we're still ironing out.

Are you guys working on the ability to delete the preset runes? (joking with you, I feel like this is the top comment you hate lol)

Hahaha. It's like I have my own inside joke. ;) 

Still working on the ability to hide those presets in champ select though, no ETA rn.
THANK YOU! Asked for this many times in the Past but never got an answer.
